Trivia

Courtney was in the music video for "Dancing in the Dark" by Bruce Springsteen. She was in the audience, and Bruce pulled her on stage to dance with him.

Courtney played Michael J. Fox's girlfriend on the show Family Ties.

Courteney is the only member of the friends main cast that hasn't been nominated for an Emmy Award.

Courteney is 5 feet, 5 inches tall.

Jennifer Aniston is the godmother of Courteney's daughter, Coco.

Courtney's nickname is "CeCe".

Courtney married Actor, Composer, Director, Producer & Writer "David Arquette" on 12 June 1999 and they have had 1 child together so far.

Her family has a lot of entertainers in it to include sisters-in-law Actresses âPatricia Arquetteâ and âRosanna Arquetteâ, her brother-in-law Actor âRichmond Arquetteâ as well as âCliff Arquetteâ and âLewis Arquetteâ.

She has a lipstick that has the same name as her nickname âCeCeâ.

In 1995 âPlayboyâ magazine named Courteney the âHottest Babeâ of the year.
